title: Handkerchief, 1900–50
medium:
Medium: cotton on linen
Technique: satin, stem, speckling and couching stitches with areas of deflected element work on a plain weave foundation
description: Handkerchief with a pattern of curving scrolls, flowers and bars of openwork embroidery.

tombstone.epitaph:
Handkerchief, 1900–50.Medium: cotton on linen
Technique: satin, stem, speckling and couching stitches with areas of deflected element work on a plain weave foundation. Gift of Stanley Herzman. 1976-92-5.
